homepage.text: Your framework for presentation and management of digital content

image.title: versatile

image.description: with own data model, search function, layout for your own repository

newsentry.title: New Ticket system
newsentry.message: The MyCoRe community uses JIRA as ticket system. Please report bugs in Jira.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Conference
newsentry.message: The MyCoRe-Team is present at the 104. Bibliothekartag in Nürnberg.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Release 2015.02
newsentry.message: In February, the interim release 2015.02 was published.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann

newsentry.title: Application
newsentry.message: The Repository "ViFa-Recht" is now online. <IntR>²Dok is the first MIR-Application.
newsentry.author: Kathleen Neumann
